title: TGaceAllStories
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: My husband will inherit $180K. I think we should invest the money. He wants to pay off his $168K mortgage. Who’s right?
items.description: “He has $15,000 in investments and $5,500 per month in disability income.”

items.title: Here’s why unemployment in  software coding and programming is so high
items.description: Manpower’s stock has its worst day in 27 years as tariff uncertainty, acceleration in use of AI led to lower demand for permanent jobs.

items.title: Supermodel Linda Evangelista is selling her NYC ‘industrial-cool chic loft’ for $8.19 million
items.description: The penthouse comes with a massive 2,500-square-foot roof terrace that boasts stunning city views.

items.title: My IRA had the biggest one-day gain ever. What will tomorrow bring?
items.description: “My personal trading account was also up 18% in one day.”

items.title: My late uncle’s house is in foreclosure. A woman claims to be his daughter and my cousin is a squatter. What can we do?
items.description: “She keeps threatening to remove this nephew from the home.”

items.title: These defensive telecom stocks can bolster your portfolio against tariff uncertainty
items.description: Investors are looking to grow their defensive positioning as Trump's efforts to reshape U.S. trade policy has fueled growth concerns.

items.title: Soybean exports still at risk despite tariff reprieve, Wells Fargo warns
items.description: The Trump administration's recent escalation with China could still pose some risk to the agricultural sector, according to Wells Fargo.

items.title: How to turn your stock market losses into a tax-savings windfall
items.description: Performing a Roth conversion could be a silver lining for investors facing steep losses in stocks.
